SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! Add read action, broker, port and username to java arguments : SET &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# = 'java -jar "&UC4RB_HRV_PATH_JAR#"' : SET &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HRV_CMD#, " -action &ACTION_NAME#")
: SET &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HRV_CMD#, " -brokerport &UC4RB_HRV_BROKER_PORT#")
: SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_HRV_USERNAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HRV_CMD#, " -username &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_HRV_BROKER# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HRV_CMD#, " -broker &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Password is decrypted : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_HRV_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD export UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD
